article_title: Gardner: ICC warrants 'major blow to Israel's standing'
sentence: Munira  Al-Shami,  whose  sister  was  killed  by  Israeli  forces  last  month,  called  the  ICC  decision  "justice  for  tens  of  thousands  of  victims,  including  my  sister  Wafa".

article_title: Gardner: ICC warrants 'major blow to Israel's standing'
sentence: Israel  believes  he  was  killed  earlier  this  year,  although  this  was  never  confirmed  by  Hamas.

article_title: Gardner: ICC warrants 'major blow to Israel's standing'
sentence: The  other  two  Hamas  figures  whom  the  ICC  originally  planned  to  prosecute  –  Yahya  Sinwar  and  Ismail  Haniyeh  –  are  both  confirmed  as  dead.
